abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, announced plans on Monday to cut 1,400 jobs in the United States, some 6 percent of the workforce there, as it sought a return on its $52 billion merger.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, announced plans on Monday to cut 1,400 jobs in the United States, some 6 percent of the workforce there, as it sought a return on its $52 billion merger.

headline.main: AB InBev Unveils U.S. Job Cuts In Savings Drive
